column4: how does one remove a desktop entry if the Main Menu Editor fails and crashes when attempted?
The menu entries are kept in either ~/.local/share/applications or /usr/share/applications
I can only suggest chaning the video driver within mplayer and see if that helps.
Open mplayer, right-click the main window, choose Preferences, go to the Video tab and choose a different video driver. This has sometimes helped me fix things.
